title: [suggestion] Caitlyn should spend more time channeling /casting her traps,or decrease the cast range
body:
Hey guys,

I was thinking about how hunters actually set up Bear Traps etc. Usually this takes a long time to setup / arm. Currently Cait does it instantly. This process takes a while and its not instant. Hunters cant just arm a trap and hurl it far and hope it will work.

Also, the range on her traps are huge. She can place them under enemy tower without gettin in tower range. I think the distance of her cast range should be greatly reduced. 

It would make more sense for her to take a knee, spend a second to arm the trap and then place it where she was standing, rather than her just instantly lobbing 3-4 traps under the enemy tower like pokeballs. 

By reducing her cast range, Cait still has the option of placing traps under the tower, however she must now get closer. This will open up some counterplay options instead of just letting her zone you from looong range. Now she has to take a knee and get closer to do the same. 

What do you guys think about Cait's traps? Do you think it would make more sense for her to reduce her cast range , or for her to spend more time casting / channeling as she arms her traps. Plus I dont think you can just toss a bear trap like that IRL. You have to carefuly place them on the ground. 

Let me know. I think cait is pretty balanced but the distance/speed she can lay traps is a little obnoxious and a little unrealistic. 
I love Cait, but I think she can be a lil oppressive with her traps. Hopefully this makes her more fun to play against. 

What do you guys think?
Cheers.

Jhin and Cait traps are hugely different from one another...

Jhin traps, on activation open into a slow field that Jhin can use his W to root someone in. It requires actual set up. It's more similar to a Teemo shroom. Also, Jhin's traps can't zone from tower because they are actually tangible and can be seen from stealth if you place them in tower range.

Caitlyn, however, can just wait for a Blitz hook/Morg snare/Lux snare and toss her traps under them and combo them. Even though the traps that Jhin and Teemo place take a while to arm. As well, Cait can just put a line of traps under enemy tower to zone them, and they can't do anything about them.

I wouldn't want her traps to be placed right on top of her, shortening the trap placement range by like 200 would be fine enough, if you have the traps only being able placed on top of you, that just throws out her lane bully style and be buffed to be compensated as either a hyper carry or mid game adc. The thing is, how would it even be possible to buff her in that direction.

If anything, she's strong right now cause I'd say the meta favors early game more still, I mean look at the amount of adcs using korean builds and still doing a sht ton of dmg and snowballing off that.

So you're saying cait shouldn't have a weakness?

Even Lux is being encouraged to 'get close' so she can proc her passive. Same with Ziggs and Xerath. 

Why does Cait get to enjoy the safety of very above-average range without ever having to get close, and even having an escape/steroid proc+slow if she ever does? 

Are you seriously saying Cait is the only champ that shouldn't have a window of counterplay?

Teemo has plenty of weaknesses that Cait does not. First and fore-most is that is range is not nearly as long, on top of him not having a dash, hard CC, or reliable AoE. On top of that, his traps are 100% disabled by red trinket, and they can be destroyed without setting them off. 

His kit is so weak that he can't do anything reliably outside of split-push top vs melees. You did NOT just compare these two champions, did you?
You can destroy Shrooms. You can't destroy Cait traps.

Personally, I think the common sense solution is to just add a normal cooldown to her traps like there was before it was a abusive skill. Let her keep the max of 5 traps, but give her back the old cooldown system. Then she can lay down traps defensively and strategically, but can't just suddenly shut off a lane at the drop of a hat.

One of Caitlyn's intended weaknesses is the absurd cast time of her abilities. She channels her Peacemaker for one full second, no other carry has to do that. Her .68 Caliber Net has a very long windup for an escape, compare it to Lucian's Pursuit or Ezreal's Arcane Shift. And of course Ace in the Hole not only has a long channel, but it also has the opportunity to be body blocked during the long channel.

We don't need to increase the cast time of her one instant ability. She needs to have something on demand.
